content: círculo inicial de la cola luego pasa los extremos a través del punto y haz un nudo recortar to add a tuft take 3 short strands of blue yarn and use your crochet hook to pull them through the beginning circle of the tail then pull the ends through the loop and tie in a knot trim gorro hat start with white empezar con blanco r 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring v 1 6 pb am r 2 6 single_crochet v 2 6 pb change to red cambiar a rojo r 3 6 single_crochet v 3 6 pb r 4 12 increase x6 v 4 12 aum x6 r 5 - 7 12 pb 3 rounds v5 - 7 12 pb 3 vueltas change to white cambiar a blanco @marsigurumi r 8 24 increase x12 v 8 24 aum x12 @marsigurumi stuff rellenar sigue @marsigurumi para más patrones
